title: Najawa's Avatar
content:
Okay... Here is where the disscussion of the fate of my Avatar lies.

Here are all the Variations ( Last Edited on 9/18/05 at 3:12AM GMT [10:12 U.S. Central Time]):

80 x 80 Avatars for K:M:
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod1.jpg[/img] - The new 80 x 80 Variation of my old avatar
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod2.jpg[/img] - Keen acts tough (edited for transparancy)
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod3.jpg[/img] - Keen's Game Face (Edited for effect, and transparancy)
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod4.jpg[/img] - Keen's attitude (I edited the eyebrows to give him a more powerfull look, and changed the background for effect)

And now the 60 x 60 options (Hard to fit as much in 60 x 60, so there are less options).

[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod1-small.jpg[/img] - My new version of my old avatar (It went from 64 x 64 to 60 x 60).
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod2-small.jpg[/img] - A mini version of "Keen acts tough"
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Mod3-small.jpg[/img] - A mini version of "Keen's Game Face"

Other Avatars:

80 x 80:

[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/latyvo.jpg[/img] - The Elvish Modder (Staring Legolas from my Lord of the Rings mod)
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/KeenFusion.jpg[/img] - Keen Fusion: A mixture of Creativity, and Genius.

And thus concludes the Avatar update.

What do you think?

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Najawa's Avatar
content:
I'm slightly confused. Why do you have 3 topics about your avatar? Just choose whatever one you like best. It's not like you'll be stuck with whatever one you choose for life - you could even use a script(?) like grafix uses to display any of them randomly.--------------

title: Re: Script?
content:
Indeed. I'll lock this topic, you should stay in your other topics about this subject. Those topics are enough.

And you can either search the net or send grafix e-mail. I've heard one how to do it but can't remember.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]
